11.content:
You are phoenixgod
Species:Dragowolf
Gender: Male
Powers:The power of 16-elements,Necromancy, Phoenix spirit.
Scales:Depends on mood
Friends:Dragoshane,Aurawolf
Girlfriend: Cynder
Phoenixgod has a dark side just like cynder.

Who do you meet?
11.title: Phoenixgod

111.content:
You are roaming the Dragon Village when you come across a purple dragon with yellow spines.
"Hi there" you say.
"Hi, who are you?" the dragon says.
"I am Phoenixgod von Dragaic VII."you say.
"Well, my name is Spyro." he says.
"I like your scale color." Spyro compliments.
"Thanks, they are mood scales."
"Mood Scales? I've never heard of those." Spyro says confused.
"Mood scales are scales that change color depending on the current emotion, They are part of a Dragonian's body." you say.
"Dragonians? What are those?" Spyro asks.
"Dragonians are the inhabitants of Dragonia." you say.
"I was not born on Dragonia." you state.
"Then why do you have mood scales?" spyro asks.
"I inherited it genetically from my father, Dragaic." you say.
Suddenly Spyro looks uncomfortable.
"Spyro, you Ok?" you ask.
"I'm fine, it is just that you are using big words like Volteer does."Spyro answers.
"Oh, ok." you say.
"What should we do now that we have gotten to known each other?" you say.
We could go fly in the air or I can introduce you to the Guardians.
111.title: Spyro

112.content:
You enter the dragon realms with no idea on how you got there.
All of a sudden you get confronted by a small black dragon.
"Hello there,"the black dragon said and judging by the voice it was feminine.
"Who are you" you ask
"My name is cynder.""And may I ask what your name is?"
"I am phoenixgod von Dragaic, 7th member of the Dragaic clan"
"Oooh, sounds interesting"
"Sadly, I was cursed by the 18-tailed phoenix spirit"
"What is that"cynder asks?
"(sighs) it is a dangerous spirit, it feeds on my negative emotions and darkness. but it increases my power ten fold."
"Wow"
112.title: Cynder

1121.content:
"You are not the only one with a dark side." she says.
I'm.....not?" you ask.
"No" she says.
Then Cynder starts growing until she is at your height and transforms into her adult form.
"Woah,Did not expect that." You say.
"C'mon Phoenix, Let's go.
1121.title: You and cynder continue talking

11211.content:
"Where are we going?" you ask.
"I want you to meet my master Malefore." she replies.
The two of you take off with Cynder still in her Adult form.
"Try to keep up." cynder says teasingly.
11211.title: Reader's choice

115.content: How about the evil dragon Malefore?
115.title: Other

1152.content: First Choice Ignitus or Terrador
1152.title: Ignitus or Terrador

12.content:
Name:Drago the Dragon.
Species:DragoLeopard.
Special Abilities:Speed you are as fast on the ground as you are in the air.
Breath:You breathe out Blue/White Fire and Ice.
Description:You are about the same size as Spyro.
Your body is Silvery/White with black spots.
Your wings are big enough to keep you in flight without tiring.

12.title: Drago

121.content:
You watch silently from the air as a Purple dragon Is talking to a group of creatures.
You also have the ability to become invisible.
You begin to wonder what they are talking about.
What do you do?
121.title: Spyro

1212.content:
You land silently behind them.
You quietly approach them.
You manage to say hello.
They turn around and you see a purple dragon a black dragon and a cheetah.
What do they do?
1212.title: Talk To Them

12122.content:
Sorry we are busy right now the purple dragon says.Ok sorry I will leave you alone you say turning to leave.You open your wings and begin to take off.Once in the air you notice that the purple dragon and his friends dont do anything else just make a few jokes.You fly back to them invisible to hear what they are talking about.Could you believe that dragon that tried to talk to us the purple one said.I know but you were still harsh on him Spyro the cheetah said.Well I dont have time for baby dragons Spyro said.He as not a baby the back dragon said.What do you mean Spyro asked?He was a fully grown dragon he just made himself appear that size.Whoa Im suprised your head is still atached after telling an older dragon to take a hike the cheetah said.Hey I didnt mean to be mean Spyro said I just thought he was a baby dragon that was going to be boring.Heaing this you have a choice.
Accept his apology and try to be friends.
Become your full size and attack.
12122.title: They Tell To Go Away

choices: questions you (bad or good, your choice)
121222.content:
You become your full size, still invisible, and fly two miles away. Then you land, turn back the way you came and start running, being a dragoleopard you can run for miles without stopping, and that's when running at over 50 miles per hour. Anyway, you charge in the general direction of the purple dragon and his friends, wings tight against your sides, head down, and moving like an actual leopard.

"Hey spyro, do you see that?" The anthro cheetah says pointing towards a small dust cloud approching from the direction you tookoff in, "what do you see hunter?" Spyro asks turning around, "cynder, can you see what it is?" "No your guess is as good as mine." The black dragoness replies. You are now only 30 yards from them, when you turn slightly, so that when you reach them you shoot past them. When you're within 20 feet, you breathe a line of flame at the purple dragon, who jumps out of the way. "What the?!?!" He shouts, while you're already running away. "WOW, that was a strong fireblast, I wonder who he is???" Says a stunned cynder. You jump and take to the sky, an angry spyro following. You laugh when he's within earshot, "well now, still think I'm boring spyro?" You yell, shocking the young dragon. "Next time, young spyro, think about who you're talking to, and about." You say before turning invisible, suprising spyro further. You then reappear on the ground next to cynder, scaring her silly. "Hello, my names drago and your names would be?" You ask as politely as possible, causing hunter and cynder to become confused but they say their names. When spyro lands he...
121222.title: showing-off

13.content:
Name: Aurawolf
Species: Wolf person.
Abilities: He can manipulate elements, transform into a dragon
and capable of using a celestial brush
Details: You stand upright in your normal form.
Your about the same size as Spyro (Both normal and dragon form).
You have Grey fur with blue markings around your body in your normal form
and you have blue scales in you dragon form.
Friends: Dragoshane, Phoenixgod.
So who do you meet?
13.title: Aurawolf

131.content: You walk though the valley just admiring the scenery. You then stop by a patch of dirt that was dry and dead. "Oh now that’s just sad." you say looking at the ground "Let's see if I can fix that." You pull a scroll from a small pouch on your side and your brush. You set the scroll on the ground, as it open it reviled a scene similar to what you where seeing and then you draw a large circle around the dead patch on your scroll with your brush. Then the patch of dead land all of a sudden sprang forth with flowers and plant life. "There that’s better." you say smiling as you put your brush and scroll away. "Wow that was amazing." You turn and you see a purple dragon looking at you "How did you do that." You stood frozen not knowing what to do. You where kind of shy and you rarely interact with strangers. "Are you ok?" the dragon asks you. You then...
131.title: Spyro

1313.content: "I'm fine" you say as you stand up "You just startled me that’s all." "Oh sorry bout that." the purple dragon replies "I just saw what you did and I thought it was really cool." "Thanks." you reply quietly. Then...
1313.title: Try and be friendly

13132.content: Just before you say something you are surrounded by a large group of monsters. You and the Purple dragon take a battle stance. "I guess these aren’t friends of yours." you say drawing out a short sword. "No these monsters work for Malefore an evil dragon." the purple. "Well then I won't any regrets." you say extending your arm out. You raise your arm up and you capture a half of monsters in a large ball of water. You then electrify your sword and you cut at the ball electrocuting the monsters. you turn around and you see that the purple dragon had eliminated the other half of the monsters by himself. "Your not bad." you say. "Your good yourself" the purple dragon replies "My name is Spyro." "Nice to meet you Spyro I'm AuraWolf." you reply smiling. "Nice to meet you." Spyro says smiling "Hey do you want to meet my friend." You think for a minute and you reply.
13132.title: You get ambushed.

choices: A black dragon about Spyro's size.
A pink dragon about Spyro's size.
131321.content: "I would love to." You reply. "Great follow me" Spyro said with a smile. You follow Spyro and you soon meet...
131321.title: Sure sounds good.

Name: MightyWolf
Gender:
Species: Anthro Wolf
Appearance:
A grey wolf with black tribal markings all over him.
Power type: Darkness
Abilities:
Shadow missile - Turns MightyWolf into a very fast missile of darkness to attack at high speed.
Shadow jump - Enables MightyWolf to jump off a cloud of darkness.
Close Slasher - Attacks at high speeds with claws.

Personality:
Someone who can't abandon a friend or someone in need. Likes to be free


Now who are you going to meet?
14.title: MightyWolf

choices: You see a purple dragon chasing after a thief with an egg.
141.content: You were walking through the fields. Everything was boring. Taking down thieves is boring. Everywhere you look there is thieves. They haven't stolen anything... yet. But you kept an eye on them. They knew all too much about you. Then...
141.title: A stroll in the night

1412.content: You then turn to see a thief a thief holding an egg & running quickly. You then soon see a purple dragon chasing it. "Give that back thief," you hear the dragon say. [sigh] Petty theft. One of the things I don't like to see, you thought. You then run towards the thief. Okay now or never, you thought to yourself. You engaged Shadow missile mode & attacked with such a high speed. You hit the thief & then bounce backwards. You then notice the egg up high so you use a Shadow jump to catch it. You then land perfectly with the egg in your hand. You then turn to see the dragon. "Here you go," you say happily, "One egg rescued from the thief." He then...
1412.title: You see a purple dragon chasing after a thief w...

choices: He tells you to come with him.
14121.content: "Thanks," he says nodding his head, "That was amazing! What sought of power was that?" "I have access to the powers of the shadows. That power I did to take down the thief was called Shadow Missile. The one where I bounced off a cloud of darkness is called Shadow Jump." Then
14121.title: Amazing

choices: Well known characters (Spyro, Cynder, the guardians, Sparx)
15.content:
Name: Murray
Species: Anthromorphic Shapeshifter
Forms: Fox or Wolf (I have more but I'm limiting it)
Abilities: Green Aura, used for regeneration, healing, or self-defense, reformation (able to regenerate entirely if eaten and digested.), and Twilight Magic
Last Resort Attacks: Night Frenzy (Wolf Form only), calls shadow wolves of self to attack and devastate foes. Fox Fire (Fox Form only, duh), Unleashes a powerful dark green fire from the paws, can burn even a dragon's scales, and Twilight Blast, an all-out explosive wave attack, blowing enemies away.
Personality: Cautious, Strategic, never takes a chance without reason, always willing to help a friend in need, will never forgive his enemies if they hurt his friends or himself.

Now, who to introduce him to first..
15.title: The Furry Shapeshifter

Here you meet spyro and the characters.
